title: Parking Finder Branding Configuration
description: Use this form to update the branding and configuration for your Parking Finder app. Changes will be reflected in the live application after processing.

questions.title: Town/City Name *
questions.helpText: Enter the name of your town or city as it should appear in the app

questions.title: Logo Upload
questions.helpText: Upload your town/city logo (PNG, JPG, or SVG format, max 2MB). Leave blank to use text-only branding.

questions.title: Primary Color *
questions.helpText: Primary brand color in hex format (e.g., #2563eb). This will be used for buttons and highlights.

validation.errorMessage: Please enter a valid hex color code (e.g., #2563eb)

questions.title: Secondary Color *
questions.helpText: Secondary color in hex format (e.g., #64748b). This will be used for text and borders.

validation.errorMessage: Please enter a valid hex color code (e.g., #64748b)

questions.title: Background Image Upload
questions.helpText: Upload a background image for the app (PNG or JPG format, max 5MB). Leave blank for solid color background.

questions.title: Map Center Latitude *
questions.helpText: Latitude for the default map center (decimal format, e.g., 40.7128)

questions.title: Map Center Longitude *
questions.helpText: Longitude for the default map center (decimal format, e.g., -74.0060)

questions.title: Default Zoom Level
questions.helpText: Default zoom level for the map (14 is recommended for most towns)

questions.title: Custom CSS
questions.helpText: Advanced: Custom CSS styles to override default styling. Leave blank unless you have specific styling needs.

settings.confirmationMessage: Thank you! Your branding configuration has been submitted and will be applied to the app shortly.
